text: St. Johns Park is a public park in north Portland, Oregon's St. Johns neighborhood, in the United States. The park was acquired in 1941.https://www.portlandoregon.gov/parks/finder/index.cfm?action=ViewPark&PropertyID;=681 The St. Johns Community Center is located within the park.https://www.portlandoregon.gov/parks/60413 ==See also== * List of parks in Portland, Oregon ==References== ==External links== * Category:1941 establishments in Oregon Category:Parks in Portland, Oregon Category:Protected areas established in 1941 Category:St. Johns, Portland, Oregon
title: St. Johns Park (Portland, Oregon)
